title: Initiate a Background Check
description: After a candidate accepts a contingent offer, HR must initiate a pre-employment background check.

tasks.description: Identify the candidate who has accepted the offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the candidate's status is 'Offer Accepted'.

tasks.description: Send the candidate the consent form and link to the background check vendor's portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the required forms and links to the candidate.

tasks.description: Monitor the vendor's portal for the completion of the background check.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks the portal and sees the status is 'In Progress'.
